sentences.en: Castle-hunters won't be disappointed with the Isle of Man.
sentences.cn: 马恩岛不会让城堡探寻者失望的。

sentences.en: Damage was confined to a small portion of the castle.
sentences.cn: 城堡仅有一小部分受损。

sentences.en: He grabbed at the opportunity to buy his castle.
sentences.cn: 他抓住机会买下了他的城堡。

sentences.en: He was riding on his horse looking for the castle.
sentences.cn: 他正骑着马寻找那座城堡。

sentences.en: Here another rugged castle crowns the cliffs and crags.
sentences.cn: 这里又有一座高低不平的城堡建在悬崖绝壁之上。

sentences.en: my father built castles in the air about owning a boat.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸做了拥有一条船这样的白日梦。

sentences.en: That part of Castle Walk is not thickly vegetated.
sentences.cn: 卡斯尔步行街那一地段的植被不是很厚密。

sentences.en: The castle has been put up for sale.
The castle is set in 25 acres of beautiful grounds.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡坐落于一片方圆25英亩、风景秀丽的土地上。

sentences.en: The castle looks over private parkland.
sentences.cn: 城堡俯瞰一片私家绿地。

sentences.en: The castle was rebuilt by his great grandson in 1859.
sentences.cn: 城堡在1859年由他的曾孙重建。

sentences.en: The island is surmounted by a huge black castle.
sentences.cn: 岛的最高处耸立着一座巨大的黑色城堡。

sentences.en: The Lawn Tennis Association suspended Mr Castle from the British team.
sentences.cn: 草地网球协会暂停了卡斯尔先生在英国队的职务。

sentences.en: The Normans built the castle which was reduced to ruins under Cromwell.
sentences.cn: 诺曼人建造了这座后来在克伦威尔统治时期变成废墟的城堡。

sentences.en: The original castle was probably built about AD 860.
sentences.cn: 最初的城堡可能建于公元860年左右。

sentences.en: Windsor Castle is quite literally an antique treasure trove.
sentences.cn: 温莎城堡确实是名副其实的古物宝藏。

words.tran_cn: 安居于；王车易位（castle的ing形式）

phrases.phrase: castles in the air (或 in Spain)
phrases.tran_cn: 空中楼阁，空想而不可实现的计划，白日梦
纽卡斯尔（城市名，位于美国宾夕法尼亚州西部）
温莎城堡（英国著名城堡）

trans.tran_cn: 城堡，堡垒，（国际象棋中的）车
trans.tran_en: a very large strong building, built in the past as a safe place that could be easily defended against attack

trans.tran_cn: 置…于城堡中；筑城堡防御
